resources.string: With our spa and massage services you are getting the relaxing touch off an expert. With an automatic pillow for your eyes a choice of aromatherapy oil and a huge pillow for your neck massage offerings will restore balance to mind and body.

Our spa manicure and pedicure services soothe with a warm neck pillow.Skin exfoliation and a hydrating massage an extended to the elbow for manicures and to the need for pedicures which also include a customized foot bath with essential oils.
